pkgmetadata.longdescription: Various Utilities for Microbial Genomics and Metagenomics // A collection of functions for microbial ecology and other applications of genomics and metagenomics. Companion package for the Enveomics Collection (Rodriguez-R, L.M. and Konstantinidis, K.T., 2016 DOI:10.7287/peerj.preprints.1900v1).
